activities:
Cantel Medical Corp. and its subsidiaries transact business with companies in the European Union and Switzerland. Though Cantel Medical Corp. and its subsidiaries engage primarily in business-to-business transactions, personal information may be transmitted from the European Union and Switzerland to the United States as a result of such interactions. 

Additionally, Cantel Medical Corp. and its subsidiaries maintain an internet presence and do not restrict access based on location. Accordingly, Cantel Medical Corp. and its subsidiaries may receive emails and other electronic communications in the United States from individuals located in the European Union and Switzerland. Moreover, Cantel Medical Corp. and its subsidiaries may indirectly collect an individual’s personal information through the use of network, internet, and email servers that are physically located in the United States or incidentally from other sources in the ordinary course of business. With respect to such information, Cantel Medical Corp. and its subsidiaries will only use and retain personal information to the extent appropriate to meet the purposes for which it was provided and to advance the legitimate business purposes of Cantel Medical Corp. and its subsidiaries (including, but not limited to, marketing, server maintenance, and security). 

Lastly, Cantel Medical Corp. has subsidiaries in the European Union and Switzerland. With respect to the employees of such subsidiaries, Cantel Medical Corp. will collect data for human resources purposes and transmit this data from the European Union and Switzerland to a central human resources services site located in the United States. Cantel Medical Corp. sends all human resources data collected from the United States to the same location.
corpofftitle1: Senior Vice President and General Counsel
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Organization, website client, visitor, and employee data as well as data sent to the company via email. The data covered does not include manually processed data.
privacyprograms: Cantel Medical Corp. uses a self-regulatory privacy program that adheres to Safe Harbor Privacy Principles.
recoursemech: Any individual with concerns or questions regarding the use or disclosure of personal information should direct such questions or concerns to the Cantel Compliance Department at privacy@cantelmedical.com. Cantel Medical Corp. and its subsidiaries will investigate and attempt to resolve complaints and disputes regarding the use and disclosure of personal information by reference to the principles contained in this policy. For matters that cannot be resolved between Cantel Medical Corp. and its subsidiaries and the complainant, Cantel Medical Corp. and its subsidiaries have agreed to participate in the dispute resolution procedures promulgated by the EU Data Protection Authorities and the Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner of Switzerland.
